DOC.criteria: Suffering muscular low back pain ( L1 S1 level ) . Symptoms six month duration . No benefit previous treatment . Patient must present bilaterally 2 active trigger point ( TrPs ) region low back musculature . CT scan MRI examination lumbar spine perform within past year . Absence significant pathology , bone fracture , nerve damage severe psychiatric condition . Constant persistent severe pain due nerve root compression fibromyalgia . The patient receive surgery spine . Other musculoskeletal disability e.g . myasthenia gravis , disorder neuromuscular junction . Any serious pathology , cancer , systemic inflammatory disease , vertebral fracture , neurological sign , spinal infection . Epidural injection local anaesthetic steroid within 12 week proceed inclusion . Trigger point injection local anaesthetic steroid within 8 week proceed inclusion . Pain associate urinary tract infection , gynaecological disorder . Bleeding disturbance currently use coumarin derivative .
